name: Virgo
description: Dake, goddess of Virgo, is the guardian of flawlessness and master of perfection.

skills.name: Logos Support
skills.description: Virgo grants a shield equal to 200% of her ATK to the frontmost ally for 5s. While active, the shield deals DMG equal to 60% of her ATK per sec to surrounding enemies.

upgrades.level3: Increases the DMG dealt per sec by 75% when the shield is active.

skills.name: Scientific Field
skills.description: Virgo stuns an enemy for 4s and deals DMG equal to 450% of ATK.

skills.name: Golden Triangle
skills.description: Deals DMG equal to 210% of ATK to an enemy and those around it.

upgrades.level3: Reduces healing received by hit enemies by 50% for 5s.
